name: The Nicolle Design
description:
These beautiful luxury wedding invites are perfect for any wedding. The eye catching pearlised effect card is detailed with ribbon and pearls and are certain to get some fabulous comments from the guests receiving them. These invites can be made to suit any colour theme and are made to order therefore unquie to each couple. They come complete with RSVP and envelop (for both invite and RSVP's), extras may be added on request.

Materials can also be changes to suit such as pearls can be changed to crystals, pearlised card/paper can be changed for the standard textured card/paper,etc.

Available in all styles. (Classic, single sheet, wallet and pocket fold)

Samples may be sent out on request, please get in touch with any questions, requests and the quantity required before ordering, thank you.

name: Fingerprint Wedding Guestbook Tree
description:
The fingerprint wedding guestbook tree is a unique way to remember who was in attendance at you big day. These guestbook trees are a great idea for other big events such as mile stone birthdays, anniversary's, baby showers, ect.

Your guests are asked to leave their fingerprint on the leaf-less tree with either ink or paint and also to sign their name along with their fingerprint. The fingerprint tree is a great talking point for your guests and well as creating a unique piece of art for your home.

The tree itself is made to order. It hand drawn and personalised to each persons specification. The tree itself is personalised with the couples (or person) initials within a heart 'carved' on the tree trunk and with your choice of wording under the tree.

The tree also comes complete with a frame and ink pad if required. It can also be made to any colour theme.
